bibl.title: with a contribution by Dominic MONTSERRAT, From Mesopotamia to the Roman East - The Diffusion of Manichaeism in the Eastern Roman Empire.
bibl.note: Une version abrégée du présent article paraîtra, en traduction allemande, dans ANRW. - Voir en part. pp. 61-105: 5. Manichaeism in Egypt (5.1. Fragments in Syriac from Oxyrhynchus and others; - 5.2. The Manichaean codices from Medinet Madi; - 5.3. The Cologne Mani-Codex; - 5.4. The new finds at Kellis [Dominic MONTSERRAT]; - 5.5. History of Manichaeism in Egypt).
